# bench
OpenMPI vs ZeroMQ in different patterns

## Total sent = 1PB, chunk=10MB, ZMQ PUB/SUB, MPI TCP

**Average**
ZeroMQ:
```
bench/results$ q=0
bench/results$ for x in $zmq_results;do q=`echo $q $x|awk '{print $1+$2;}'`; done
bench/results$ echo $q 51 | awk '{print $1/$2;}'
13.7617

```
MPI:
```
bench/results$ mpi_results=`cat 50rountes_1pb_10mb_zmq_pub_sub_mpi_tcp.txt | grep MPI | awk '{print $10;}'`
bench/results$ q=0
bench/results$ for x in $mpi_results;do q=`echo $q $x|awk '{print $1+$2;}'`; done
bench/results$ echo $q 51 | awk '{print $1/$2;}'
14.3457
```
